name: Gather Digital Ltd
description:
Gather is a digital agency with a focus on data driven design & build based in Manchester, UK. We are an ensemble of creative, strategic and technical professionals, turning ideas into solutions that intensify brands, connect people and unify the web. Gatherâ€™s core thinking is around efficient organisation and consolidation of digital information.
We specialise in providing control over your business data and deliver tools that enable you to work with it and push it to multiple channels such as: Websites, Apps, Ecommerce & Web-to-print. With a keen eye for detail and user experience, we design & develop well crafted, creative front end solutions powered by robust digital platforms that ensure information is kept up to date and secure.
